alert.note: Alert for Coastal Dixie; Inland Dixie; Lafayette (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 26 at 2:39PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT SOUTHWESTERN LAFAYETTE AND DIXIE COUNTIES THROUGH 315 PM EDT... At 238 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 9 miles northeast of Steinhatchee to 10 miles south of Horseshoe Point. Movement was northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Cross City, Horseshoe Point, Suwannee, Horseshoe Beach, Shamrock, Cross City Airport, Shired Island, Jena, Hines, Jonesboro, Eugene, Yellow Jacket, Clara, Fletcher, and Old Town. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
